name: INFINIROOM -LD37
description:
Back to INFINIROOM mobile: https://lonebot.itch.io/infiniroom-mobile

----LUDUM DARE PAGE : INFINIROOM----

CONTROLS:
Z/Up/Space - Once: jump, twice: flip & destroy traps around you
F (windows only) - Fullscreen
M - Mute

* This game has controller support.
